column5: Had 2 hours this evening to unwind, so off to another Niagara backwater for smallies. Got bit off twice by something toothy, but still went 5 for 10.    I was going to stay later but the skeeters were hungry and the DEET wasn't working any more.
5 for 10 in 2 hours sounds good to me! If you discover its a musky biting you off rather than hammerhandle pike I'd be happy to help you with that problem!
Black/Blue tubes? Do they work, I got 2 different b/b variations of tubes...might try them out on my trip.  Anyway, nice job with the smallies, tubes rule!
It was actually a purple tube and a blood tube that were the working baits. My hooksets were not what they should have been seeing as I was rigging the tubes weedless. My bad
Bet they put up a nice fight
Nice fish!  I'm hoping to use your advice to catch some fish on the 3 day weekend coming up!  Thanks again!
I gotta try tube jigs one of these days.
Half the fun in fishing is in what we share and the friendships we form in our adventures
nice smallies.... I might try rigging the tubes I bought Last Year weedless and drag em across some weeds or Pond Scum  thanks for the idea
